column1: Haudh-en-Elleth was the grave of Finduilas of Nargothrond that stood near the Crossings of Teiglin on the western borders of the Forest of Brethil.  Turin would not allow Orcs to draw near to the mound.
column2: p. 197  On one of his forays to battle Orcs near the Crossings
column3: Turin discovered Niënor his sister (whom he did not know) upon the mound
column4: naked and cowering from a storm.
column5: p. 214  Later Turin met Mablung at the mound and learned that Niënor was indeed his sister.

column1: Haudh-en-Elleth is a Sindarin name glossed as "Mound of the Elf-maid" or "mound (grave) of the Noldorin maid".
